metadata.title: Bridesmaid Bride Party House Slippers for Women Sneaker Slippers Women's Comfy House Shoes, Stylish Furry Bedroom Shoes,Faux Fur Non Slip Cozy Indoor Outdoor Slide Closed Toe
features: Available Colour: Black, Light Green, Navy&Red. Available Size : S(5-6 US)/M(7-8 US)/L(9-10 US)/XL(11-12 US)

WARM & COMFORTABLE: To ensure a warm feeling even during frosty winters, please put these fuzzy slides on. Furry slipper can keep your feet delightfully warm. You can wear them all day long with soft &comfortable. An ideal gift for your friends and families, make them feel warm, both feet and heart.

Eye-catching at Hen Party As the big day approaches, there must be a hen night for bride and these furry slippers will make you stand out at the party. Or give it to bride as a premarital gift, sweet and thoughtful.

Cozy House Slippers: Lightweight and flexible, these women slippers are great for you to relax your feet at home. You can walking around the home or backyard freely with these comfortable slides. Putting these cozy shoe and pajamas on after taking a shower, enjoy this moment.

Fashion Outdoor Slide: Trendy design and popular style make these shoes a stylish slide. You can put on these fashion slippers whether indoor or outdoor, hang out, stroll around the supermarket or go shopping with friends. Almost any outfit can go well with these closed toe slippers.

Non Slip Indoor Shoes: Non-slip rubber outsole, has strong grip and excellent anti-skid performance, to ensure the tile or wood floor will not be scratched. You could wear them around the home freely, every step you take in these slides is safety and steady.
description: Looking for a sweet and thoughtful woman's gifts? These non slip women slippers could match most of your outfits and suitable for living room, bedroom, kitchen etc . A pair of cozy fluffy house shoes must be a heart-warming gift in this winter, both for yourself , for mom or for friends.  Tips: Due to the different monitor and light effect, the actual color of the item might be slightly different from the color showed on the pictures. Thanks for your understanding! If you have any question, please feel free to ask us.Your satisfaction is our eternal purpose of service. title: Celebrate in slippers with your ride-or-die!
